content.question: Assume that  myString  is a properly declared and initialized  String  object. Which of the following best describes the result of the call  doSomething(myString)?

choices.label: The method call returns a  String  containing the contents of  myString  unchanged.
The method call returns a  String  containing the contents of  myString  with the order of the characters reversed from their order in  myString.
The method call returns a  String  containing all but the first character of  myString.
The method call returns a  String  containing only the first and second characters of  myString.

content.answer: The method call returns a  String  containing the contents of  myString  unchanged.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
